channel.title: Blog on The Mech Programming Language
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on The Mech Programming Language

item.title: Hello World
item.author: cmontella@live.com (Corey Montella)
item.description: Welcome to the inaugural post of the Mech language blog, where I will be documenting my work on the language as I go. In this first post, I will just talk a little about what the language is for, and where I’ll be taking it in the near future. You can also follow Mech’s development on Twitter (@MechLang) or by signing up for the mailing list. What’s Mech? I’m developing Mech as a domain specific language for a project I’m working on, the essence of which I hope will map to problems people would like to solve in general.
